titleStmt.title: A list of the names of such persons who are thought fit for their accomodation, and the furtherance of the service in Ireland, to be entertained as reformadoes and to receive the halfe pay due to the severall officers here under named, untill opportunity be offered, according to their merit, further to prefer them; or that order be given to the contrary, by the Committee at Guildhall London, 1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
